resources.string: "Don't have an account? Sign up here!"
"Have an account already? Log in here!"
"You may need internet connection to login."
"You may need internet connection to sign up."
"Hmmm, your connection may have a problem."
"Your connection may have dropped.You can't move to the next ad without a stable connection to the Internet."
"Your back online, you may now continue."
"This may be the last ad we've got for you today."
"This is where all the stats concerning ads you've seen and money you can claim is stored."
"You cannot pin this without an internet connection"
"We're unable to unpin this right now."
"Your connection may be low,try again after a few moments."
"You may need internet connection to Upload your Advert."
"Note that once you pay, you can upload your advert at any time."
"Make sure the image looks good in the card."
"Something went wrong,try uploading again after a few minutes."
